SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.codehaus.preon.annotation
Annotation Type Slice

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Slice

The annotation to be used if you want to make sure that only a slice of the underlying BitBuffer is passed on while decoding a (compound) value. Useful as an alternative to LengthPrefix. With LengthPrefix, the size of the slice needs to be encoded in the bit stream itself. With Slice you can just pass in a fixed value, or a reference to a variable read somewhere else.

Author:
Wilfred Springer

Optional Element Summary
 String size
          The size of the slice in number of bits.
 

size

public abstract String size
The size of the slice in number of bits. (A Limbo expression.)

Returns:
The size of the slice, in number of bits.
Default:
"0"
